name: @skymoore/grokipedia-mcp
description: Search and retrieve Grokipedia articles with filters, full content, and citations. Explore related pages and extract sections to quickly gather relevant knowledge. Run guided workflows to research topics, find sources, and compare subjects.

tools.name: search
tools.description: Search for articles in Grokipedia with optional filtering and sorting.

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of results to return (default: 12, max: 50)

query.title: Query
query.description: Search query string to find matching articles

min_views.title: Min Views
min_views.description: Filter to articles with at least this many views (optional)

tools.name: get_page
tools.description: Get complete page information including metadata, content preview, and citations summary.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Unique slug identifier of the page to retrieve

max_content_length.title: Max Content Length
max_content_length.description: Maximum length of content to return (default: 5000)

tools.name: get_page_content
tools.description: Get only the article content without citations or metadata.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Unique slug identifier of the page to retrieve content from

max_length.title: Max Length
max_length.description: Maximum length of content to return (default: 10000)

tools.name: get_page_citations
tools.description: Get the citations list for a specific page.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Unique slug identifier of page to retrieve citations from

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of citations to return (optional, returns all if not specified)

tools.name: get_related_pages
tools.description: Get pages that are linked from the specified page.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Unique slug identifier of page to find related pages for

limit.title: Limit
limit.description: Maximum number of related pages to return (default: 10)

tools.name: get_page_section
tools.description: Extract a specific section from an article by header name.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Unique slug identifier of page to extract section from

max_length.title: Max Length
max_length.description: Maximum length of section content to return (default: 5000)

section_header.title: Section Header
section_header.description: Exact header text of the section to extract (case-insensitive)

tools.name: get_page_sections
tools.description: Get a list of all section headers in an article.

slug.title: Slug
slug.description: Unique slug identifier of page to list sections for
